mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Willcox, Jacob
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Willcox, Jacob Patient Age: 30. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left scapula. Musket bullet entered about one inch above inferior angle of scapula axillary border passing transversely to exist one and half inches to the left of the spinal column. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Willcox, Jacob

Gun shot fracture of left scapula. Musket bullet entered about one inch above inferior angle of scapula axillary border passing transversely to exist one and half inches to the left of the spinal column
